Run the standard wrapper and then show the map

```{r}
library(timelinesr)

timeline <- "Timelines/Timeline.json"
photos_dir <- "Photos"
timezone <- "America/Los_Angeles" ## "Pacific/Honolulu"

# Run the Wrapper Workflow
timeline <- read_timeline(timeline)
results  <- geotag_photos(photos_dir, timeline, tz = timezone)
write_geotags(results, photo_dir)

# Show the Map
visualize_geotags(results)
```
